TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Oh, Daz, look at the sunrise on Giant's Deep's horizon! I'd forgotten how short the days last on this island and Statue Island..
CASSAVA: And someone has even furnished <color=orange>Lover's Cove</color> with one of Phlox's beautiful statues! Did you transport this here, Daz?
CASSAVA: Oh? What are you recording, my love?
DAZ: O-oh, is this recording? I, quite meant to play us some music to unwind!
DAZ: But, since it is already preserving our words.. I would like to say a few heartfelt words to you, my love.
DAZ: The past few years we have spent together have been nothing short of magical.
DAZ: Your diligence and spirit brightens my darkest days. You inspire me to innovate, iterate and appreciate details to enjoy in everything we do.
DAZ: You make me feel so appreciated and loved at all times.. And I love you so, so much.
DAZ: Cassava, will you take my appendage in marriage?
CASSAVA: D-Daz, my dazzling star! Of-
DAZ: YES!! I knew you'd say yes! Hypothesis confirmed! You said yes!!
CASSAVA: D-Daz? I, I didn't say it yet! But yes, yes! Of course I would take your appendage in marriage!
DAZ: The test today was a success, Cassava! AND we're engaged! Yes!!
CASSAVA: I'm so confused.. And so happy!
DAZ: I'll explain everything shortly, love! Come, let us write to our friends in the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> through the projection wall at once!
